flavorText: "I could demonstrate how the leonin sunsplicer works, but then you'd be too dead to buy one."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich könnte dir vorführen, wie der Sonnensäbel der Leoniden funktioniert, aber danach wärst du zu tot, um dir einen zu kaufen."
foreignData.name: Vulshok-Kampfmeister
foreignData.text:
Eile
Wenn der Vulshok-Kampfmeister ins Spiel kommt, lege alle Ausrüstung im Spiel an ihn an. (Die Kontrolle über die Ausrüstung ändert sich nicht.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Podría demostrarte cómo funciona el cortasoles leonino, pero quedarás demasiado muerto para comprar uno."
foreignData.name: Maestra de guerra vúlshok
foreignData.text:
Prisa.
Cuando la Maestra de guerra vúlshok entre en juego, anéxale todo el equipo en juego. (El control del equipo no cambia.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Je pourrais vous montrer comment vous servir d'un épisseur solaire léonin, mais les morts font de mauvais clients. »
foreignData.name: Maîtresse des batailles vulshoke
foreignData.text:
Célérité
Quand la Maîtresse des batailles vulshoke arrive en jeu, attachez-lui tous les équipements en jeu. (Le contrôle de l'équipement ne change pas.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Potrei mostrarvi il funzionamento dello spaccasoli leonid, ma poi sareste troppo morti per comprarne uno."
foreignData.name: Signora della Guerra Vulshok
foreignData.text:
Rapidità
Quando la Signora della Guerra Vulshok entra in gioco, assegna a essa tutto l'Equipaggiamento in gioco. (Il controllo dell'Equipaggiamento non cambia.)

foreignData.flavorText: レオニンの陽継剣がどんな物か見せてやってもいいけどな、そしたらお前は死んじまって買えなくなるぜ。
foreignData.name: ヴァルショクの戦場の達人
foreignData.text:
速攻
ヴァルショクの戦場の達人が場に出たとき、場に出ているすべての装備品をそれにつける。 （装備品のコントローラーは変わらない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu poderia demonstrar o funcionamento do heli-divisor leonino, mas você ficaria morto demais para comprá-lo."
foreignData.name: Vulshoque Mestre de Batalha
foreignData.text:
Ímpeto
Quando Vulshoque Mestre de Batalha entra em jogo, ligue todos os cards de Equipamento em jogo a ele. (O controle do Equipamento não é alterado.)

name: Vulshok Battlemaster
originalText:
Haste
When Vulshok Battlemaster comes into play, attach all Equipment in play to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

rulings.text: The enters-the-battlefield effect moves all Equipment onto the Battlemaster, regardless of whether that Equipment was attached to other creatures.
Other players’ Equipment is moved onto the Battlemaster as well as your own. This doesn’t change who controls the Equipment or who can activate its equip ability to move it onto another creature.
If an Equipment can’t equip Vulshok Battlemaster, it isn’t attached to the Battlemaster, and it doesn’t become unattached (if it’s attached to a creature).

text:
Haste
When Vulshok Battlemaster enters the battlefield, attach all Equipment on the battlefield to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
